1.name: What Price Hollywood?
1.description: The career of a waitress takes off when she meets an amiable drunken Hollywood producer.

2.name: Freaks
2.description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

3.name: Scarface
3.description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

4.name: The Mummy
4.description: A resurrected Egyptian mummy stalks a beautiful woman he believes to be the reincarnation of his lover and bride.

5.name: The Old Dark House
5.description: Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when they stumble upon the Femm family estate.

6.name: Tarzan the Ape Man
6.description: A trader and his daughter set off in search of the fabled graveyard of the elephants in deepest Africa, only to encounter a wild man raised by apes.

7.name: Grand Hotel
7.description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

8.name: The Most Dangerous Game
8.description: An insane hunter arranges for a ship to be wrecked on an island where he can indulge in some sort of hunting and killing of the passengers.

9.name: Island of Lost Souls
9.description: An obsessed scientist conducts profane experiments in evolution, eventually establishing himself as the self-styled demigod to a race of mutated, half-human abominations.

10.name: Trouble in Paradise
10.description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

11.name: The Sign of the Cross
11.description: A Roman soldier becomes torn between his love for a Christian woman and his loyalty to Emperor Nero.

12.name: A Farewell to Arms
12.description: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

13.name: Vampyr
13.description: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

14.name: Shanghai Express
14.description: A loose woman rediscovers a former lover during a dangerous train ride to Shanghai.

15.name: Red Dust
15.description: The owner of a rubber plantation becomes involved with the new wife of one of his employees.

16.name: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
16.description: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.

17.name: White Zombie
17.description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

18.name: Pack Up Your Troubles
18.description: Two war veterans help orphaned child to find her grandfather.

19.name: 20,000 Years in Sing Sing
19.description: Brash hoodlum Tom Connors enters Sing Sing cocksure of himself and disrespectful toward authority, but his tough but compassionate warden changes him.

20.name: Horse Feathers
20.description: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against the rival Darwin University.

21.name: Bird of Paradise
21.description: A native girl falls for a visitor to her island, but she's chosen to be sacrificed to the volcano god.

22.name: Blonde Venus
22.description: A cabaret singer takes up with a millionaire to pay for her gravely ill husband's operation.

23.name: Red-Headed Woman
23.description: Lillian relentlessly attempts to seduce a married man.

24.name: Le sang d'un poète
24.description: A young artist draws a face at a canvas on his easel. Suddenly the mouth on the drawing comes into life and starts talking. The artist tries to wipe it away with his hand, but when he looks...                See full summary »

25.name: The Bitter Tea of General Yen
25.description: A Chinese warlord and an engaged Christian missionary fall in love.

26.name: Rain
26.description: A prostitute newly arrived in the South Pacific finds herself at odds with a stern missionary determined to save her soul.

27.name: The Beast of the City
27.description: Police Chief Jim Fitzpatrick ruthlessly goes after organized crime and is prepared to use brutal and violent methods to fight it.

28.name: Arsène Lupin
28.description: A detective is tasked to capture an elusive thief called Arsene Lupin.

29.name: Jewel Robbery
29.description: A gentleman thief charms a Viennese baron's wife and also conducts a daring daylight robbery of a jewellers.

30.name: One Way Passage
30.description: A terminally ill woman and a debonair murderer facing execution meet and fall in love on a trans-Pacific crossing, each without knowing the other's secret.

31.name: Devil and the Deep
31.description: Man sets out for revenge after learning of his wife's affair.

32.name: One Hour with You
32.description: An unhappily married couple try to come between a happy one.

33.name: Boudu sauvé des eaux
33.description: A bookseller saves a tramp from drowning and shelters him, but the tramp's odd behavior starts to wear everyone down.

34.name: Forbidden
34.description: A librarian takes a cruise and falls for an unobtainable man, a district attorney married to a crippled woman.

35.name: A Bill of Divorcement
35.description: A man, Hilary Fairfield returns home after fifteen years in a mental asylum. However, he finds things are not the way they were when he left.

36.name: No Man of Her Own
36.description: A con man on the run from the police falls for a librarian.

37.name: Three on a Match
37.description: Although Vivian Revere is seemingly the most successful of a trio of reunited schoolmates, she throws it away by descending into a life of debauchery and drugs.

38.name: Thirteen Women
38.description: Ursula plots to murder 12 women with her supernatural powers.

39.name: Love Me Tonight
39.description: A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.

40.name: Little Orphan Annie
40.description: Daddy Warbucks has to go on a long trip, leaving Annie alone. While wandering the street, Sandy leads Annie to discover Mickey, who is crying. Mickey's grandmother recently died, and he is ...                See full summary »

41.name: Number Seventeen
41.description: A gang of thieves gather at a safe house following a robbery, but a detective is on their trail.

42.name: If I Had a Million
42.description: A dying tycoon gives million-dollar windfalls to eight people picked from the city directory.

43.name: Queen Kelly
43.description: A convent girl is abducted and seduced by a prince before being sent off to a brothel in East Africa.

44.name: Chandu the Magician
44.description: When delusional madman Roxor kidnaps a scientist in hopes of using his death ray to achieve world dominance, he is opposed by Chandu, a powerful hypnotist and yogi.

45.name: Call Her Savage
45.description: Sexy Texas gal storms her way through life, brawling and boozing until her luck runs out, forcing her to learn the errors of her ways.

46.name: Merrily We Go to Hell
46.description: A drunken newspaperman is rescued from his alcoholic haze by an heiress whose love sobers him up and encourages him to write a play, but he lapses back into dipsomania.

47.name: This Is the Night
47.description: An affair is almost exposed when Claire's husband unexpectedly returns early from Summer Olympics.

48.name: The Purchase Price
48.description: A torch singer becomes a mail-order bride for a farmer.

49.name: Night After Night
49.description: A successful ex-boxer opens a high-class speakeasy in what once was the childhood home of a formerly rich society girl.

50.name: The Mask of Fu Manchu
50.description: Englishmen race to find the tomb of Genghis Khan before the sinister Fu Manchu does.
